name: Mahjong - Solitaire Game
description:
Float into meditation and train your brain while solving Mahjong puzzles! It's the perfect way to boost your mood in the blink of an eye! Install to try now!

What you get:

* Classic game with no bells and whistles.
* Hundreds of levels to explore.
* Hours of play to challenge your brain.
* Hints and shuffles to power up your progress.
* Meditative background music that enhances the pleasure.
* Seamless app experience to enjoy it at any time.
* New game from a top developer!

How to play:

Match pairs of tiles and try to clear the board.

Mahjong is an addictive game that can take you away for hours of intellectual fun. Try it now!
